definitions.definition: To harm or injure (someone or something) physically .
To harm, injure, or destroy (someone or something) by fire , lightning , or some other heat source ; to blast ; to scorch ; to wither .
definitions.label_groups: by extension , chiefly literary and poetic

definitions.definition: To severely hurt (someone's feelings , soul , etc., or something intangible ) through acts , words spoken , etc.

main_definition: ( archaic or Scotland ) To harm or injure (someone or something) physically .
secondary_definitions: ( by extension , chiefly literary and poetic ) To harm, injure, or destroy (someone or something) by fire , lightning , or some other heat source ; to blast ; to scorch ; to wither .
( figuratively ) To severely hurt (someone's feelings , soul , etc., or something intangible ) through acts , words spoken , etc.
